oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sputter deposited lizn ferrite films on fused quartz substrates
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DASH, J
KRISHNAN, R
VENKATARAMANI, N
PRASAD, S
SHRINGI, SN
KISHAN, P
KUMAR, N
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: inplane
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lithium-zinc ferrite thin films have been deposited by rf sputtering technique on amorphous fused quartz substrates. The as-deposited films were amorphous and crystallization took place when the films were annealed at 800 degrees C, The observed magnetization values varied from 34 to 60% of that of the bulk. The coercivity was found to be in the range 35-42 Oe.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF MAGNETISM AND MAGNETIC MATERIALS,152,L1-L4
